TextView.android:text:
The Goal of the game is to save your nation from the Spread of evil Corona, by taking Quality decisions at right time

All the Statistics about the game are shown on the upper half of the screen and in lower half you will have decisions to take

Every group has 10 decisions to take from and you can take any decision from any group at any point of time

To take any decision, you require Power, which is replenished every few days

At the end, you will get an score of how well you played based on your decisions
